import React,{useState}from'react';import'./CarReviews.css';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const CarReviews=()=>{const[reviews,setReviews]=useState([{id:1,model:'2024 Electrica Sedan',review:'The 2024 Electrica Sedan offers an impressive range, cutting-edge technology, and a luxurious interior. It sets a new standard for electric vehicles.',rating:'★★★★★'},{id:2,model:'2024 Mountain SUV',review:'Designed for adventure, the 2024 Mountain SUV combines rugged capability with comfort. It’s as at home on the trails as it is on city streets.',rating:'★★★★☆'},{id:3,model:'2024 Grand Coupe',review:'The 2024 Grand Coupe blends performance with elegance in a way that few can. Its driving dynamics and luxurious appointments impress.',rating:'★★★☆☆'},{id:4,model:'2023 City Compact',review:'The 2023 City Compact is the perfect urban companion, offering efficiency and agility in a compact form factor.',rating:'★★★★☆'},{id:5,model:'2024 Future Truck',review:'The 2024 Future Truck redefines what to expect from a pickup, with unparalleled power and a suite of technological advancements.',rating:'★★★★★'}]);const[newReview,setNewReview]=useState({model:'',review:'',rating:''});const handleInputChange=e=>{const{name,value}=e.target;setNewReview({...newReview,[name]:value});};const addReview=e=>{e.preventDefault();const review={model:newReview.model,review:newReview.review,rating:newReview.rating};fetch('http://localhost:3001/reviews',{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify(review)}).then(response=>response.json()).then(()=>{setReviews([...reviews,review]);setNewReview({model:'',review:'',rating:''});// Reset form
}).catch(error=>console.error('Error:',error));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Car Reviews"}),reviews.length>0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"reviewList",children:reviews.map(review=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{className:"reviewItem",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:review.model}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:review.review}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Rating: ",review.rating]})]},review.id))}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"No reviews available at the moment."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:addReview,className:"formStyle",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Add Your Review"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",name:"model",className:"inputStyle",value:newReview.model,onChange:handleInputChange,placeholder:"Model",required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{name:"review",className:"textareaStyle",value:newReview.review,onChange:handleInputChange,placeholder:"Review",required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",name:"rating",className:"inputStyle",value:newReview.rating,onChange:handleInputChange,placeholder:"Rating",required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"buttonStyle",children:"Submit Review"})]})]});};export default CarReviews;
